Title: Add Biometric Login Support
Description: Enable login using fingerprint or Face ID for quicker access and improved security.

Title: Offline Mode for Core Features
Description: Allow limited app functionality when offline to improve accessibility.

Title: Custom Notification Sounds
Description: Users can assign custom sounds for different notifications.

Title: Multi-Language Support
Description: Translate the app UI into top requested languages.

Title: Add Dark Mode to Mobile App
Description: Implement a dark mode option in the mobile app. Highly requested by users, minor impact on functionality but improves user satisfaction.

Title: In-App Feedback Form
Description: Let users submit feedback or report bugs directly from the app.

Title: Two-Factor Authentication
Description: Add an option for 2FA during login for improved security.

Title: Daily Usage Insights
Description: Provide users with daily stats and summaries of their app usage.

Title: Bookmark Feature
Description: Allow users to bookmark content for later viewing.

Title: Live Chat Support Integration
Description: Embed live chat support to improve customer service response times.

Title: App Widget for Quick Actions
Description: Add a home screen widget for quick access to key actions.

Title: Custom Themes
Description: Let users select color themes beyond light/dark modes.

Title: Accessibility Improvements
Description: Improve screen reader support, contrast ratios, and font scaling options.

Title: Search Function for Settings
Description: Allow users to search within the app settings to quickly find options.

Title: Push Notification Scheduler
Description: Let users set time windows when they want to receive notifications.
